caption: I visited the pop-up museum earlier today and really enjoyed it! There have some amazing Breitling pieces on display and they also have a really cool flying simulator that is free to try for all the visitors. Philip, the Breitling employee we met there, was extremely nice and knowledgeable! He helped us with the simulator and we spent an extra 30 minutes talking about our watch collections and vintage Breitling pieces.

A free-to-attend Breitling pop-up museum lies at the heart of Zurich, just minutes from the main boutique. It showcases a wide variety of models spanning Breitling‚Äôs three ‚Äòrealms‚Äô: air, land, and sea. You‚Äôll even find models worn by the Breitling family themselves, as well as pieces famously sported by Richard Branson.  Philip was very welcoming, assisting with registration, providing an overview of the models on display, and sharing a brief history of the brand.  Additionally, there‚Äôs a rare opportunity to purchase Breitling merchandise that‚Äôs typically unavailable in boutiques or authorized dealers.  In short, it‚Äôs a must-visit for Breitling enthusiasts in Switzerland.

We randomly came across this pop-up while walking through Zurich and I‚Äôm super glad we did. The exhibit has a bunch of amazing older watches on display, along with exhibits to see and read through including Breitling‚Äôs involvement and partnership with various other industries. The staff was very friendly and helpful, and were able to provide additional commentary about some of the things that we were looking at and reading about. I‚Äôd definitely recommend stopping in if you are in Zurich, I think they said it was going to be there until March or April.

We were shown a world of watches unbeknownst to us by our lovely guide Philip - An absolute treasure-trove of knowledge and exciting historical facts were bestowed upon us as we walked through the beautiful and very tasteful museum. A must-see for those with even a slight inclination for anything watchmaking!

Super cool museum with much to see. Philip, the guide who showed us around was really knowledgeable and passionate! He was very friendly, engaging and stood behind he museum with so much confidence. Living in Zurich city, I will definitely come back!

Very nice exhibition showing history of Breitling and their watches throughout the time. Modern, clean with nice atmosphere. Bar has a very good selection of food and drinks too. The highlight is definitely the passionate staff, especially Philip! Insanely knowledgeable about the brand, their heritage and all the watches. Definitely the right person at the right place. Recommend visiting!
Great museum - a must on your next visit to Zurich. Experience 140 years of Breitling history and enjoy the great coffee to linger and immerse yourself.

I spent a wonderful time here with my family. So much to see and learn. From watch making to NASA space missions. My daughter really loved the flight ‚úàÔ∏è simulator - Switzerland üá®üá≠is quite and expensive country so it‚Äôs brilliant that you and go for free.

A must-visit for any watch enthusiast. I was fortunate to have a tour with Philip, whose extensive knowledge about Breitling and fascinating anecdotes kept me engaged throughout. His passion for the brand is truly contagious. After the visit, I couldn‚Äôt wait to put on my own Breitling and enjoy it even more.  The museum is fantastic, well-designed, and definitely worth a visit.

Visiting the new Breitling pop-up museum in Zurich was an extraordinary experience. Philip's knowledge of Breitling is unmatched and his passion around Breitling gives the museum the life it deserves.  He brought the brand‚Äôs history and craftsmanship to life, creating a genuine connection to the brand. If he weren‚Äôt so dedicated to his work, I‚Äôd hire him myself!

YOU MUST GO!!  The museum is amazing, easy to walk thorough and full of nice installations! There are also dynamic sections and you can discover everything about the brand‚Äôs history! Totally recommended.  Also it‚Äôs for FREE!!
Interesting pop-up museum describing the history of the brand. The museum has also an on-site caffe.

The Breitling pop-up museum is definitely worth a visit! The exhibits are really interesting, showcasing the brand's history and the evolution of its amazing timepieces. My personal favorite was the flight simulator - such a fun experience! Plus, the staff were super friendly and knowledgeable, which made the whole visit even better. If you're into watches or just looking for something different to do, check it out before it‚Äôs gone!

I had an incredible experience! The staff was exceptionally friendly, making me feel welcome from the moment I arrived. The collection of timepieces was absolutely stunning, each with its own unique and captivating story. The highlight for me was the flight simulator‚Äîit was an absolute joy and added an exciting touch to the visit. Highly recommend for anyone looking to dive into the world of timepieces with a fun and engaging team!
Great experience üëç very kind staff üëç 5/5 definitely try the flight sim and the coffee

I had the pleasure of attending the Breitling pop-up museum in Zurich today, and I must say the experience was truly enhanced by our guide, Antonia. She is incredibly knowledgeable and passionate about the history of Breitling watches, making each piece come alive with fascinating stories and historical context. Antonia‚Äôs ability to explain the technical details in an engaging and easy-to-understand way made the whole experience both educational and enjoyable. Her enthusiasm for horology was infectious, and I left the exhibit with a deeper appreciation for Breitling‚Äôs legacy. Highly recommended!" Gladys
Many thanks for the great experience üëç a big thanks goes to the professional team there too üôå we had a blast üòé
We visited last week and had the best time. Amazing layout and great information. Philip was incredibly helpful showing us around! Service with a smile and a must visit for sure!

We had an amazing time, and I highly recommend not missing the flight Simulator. Huge thanks to Antonia, who made the visit even more engaging by sharing fascinating stories that added a human touch. A must-see!

A must visit whilst in Zurich! The Breitling Pop-Up Museum will be a treat for anyone passionate about watchmaking and those who appreciate the art of pristine Swiss watchmaking, as well as for those just curious about learning something new.
Very nice overall experience. The museum is succinct and informative. The service is friendly and excellent. There is a flight simulator and a very nice lounge as well.
Stunningly real life time traveling experience.,  The feeling after the visit makes me proud of wearing my Breitling watch.  Highly recommend 5/5‚ú®
Discovered by luck the Museum, as a long time owner of the watch, I really enjoyed the tour.  Hope it stays!
Philip helped me a lot. He was very friendly and  very knowledgeable about the products.
Don‚Äôt miss a visit to the fantastic Breitling museum, 3 floors full of historically important watches and great chat with resident expert Philip Blumer!

I bought a Chronomat at Geneva and was told to visit the museum at Zurich. We were Disappointed because we searched this place for quite a while but they claimed they are closed for private event. Should have updated at google.
Beautifully designed museum, free entry, good coffee! highly recommend heading down if you're in the centre of town.
Amazing and friendly staff! The fascinating stories and stunning watches make the visit truly special. I love it here and will definitely be coming back!
very impressed! theres so much history behind this brand and its all displayed and conveyed beautifully.
Wonderful visit curated by Antonia, very fascinating history of Breitlling. Thank you.
Philip was very informative  Fantastic experience having come from London to explore Zurich and the history of watchmaking and makers

A really nice exhibition with a lot of interesting information about Breitling. You can take part yourself or fly with a flight simulator. The drinks at the Breitling Bar were great ü§© Thanks for the invitation, a top experience üëå

What a great museum!! Great work and expectations were even exceeded!! Definitely worth a visit!! From A to Z there was nothing missing, there is something for everyone even if you just want to drink a cappuccino and eat a piece of cake. And the atmosphere was so pleasant, everyone was extremely friendly and always available to help with questions. It was so good you might as well charge admission!! we will definitely go again üëçüï∞Ô∏è
Nice exhibition, very nice staff and the cafe is highly recommended (try the burger after you've seen the exhibition!). I will definitely stop by again with watch lovers in the family.
Very good for discovering the history of the brand as well as the three magnificent models designed for the 140th anniversary of Breitling We had a good time, welcoming staff and the meal was perfect
Stumbled upon this museum by chance! Museum retracing the history of Breitling. Simple, clear and captivating.

On Tuesday I visited the museum with my colleague. Philip gave us a friendly welcome and showed us around the museum. It was a very interesting tour and very exciting exchanges with Philip. Thank you again for that. I would immediately recommend a visit to the museum.
Very informative exhibition with some really great exhibits. Well-organized and helpful team. A super well-rounded thing!
